China Sinochem buys rare Venezuelan oil cargo after U.S. suspends sanctions -sourcesChina's Sinochem Corp has bought a million barrels of Venezuelan crude oil for arrival in December, a rare purchase as the state oil and chemicals group capitalises on Washington's suspension of sanctions on the South American producer. Diplomatic pressure builds over Hong Kong democrat Jimmy Lai's security trialInternational pressure was building over a landmark national security trial in Hong Kong for leading China critic Jimmy Lai, with British authorities calling for consular access to the jailed democrat as his trial entered its second day on Tuesday.
